lines.dialogue: I don't understand you. You chose to kill one over two, but now that the choice is between killing millions and just hurting one, you choose to kill?
Do you want to repent but, you think pain is worse than mass death? I suppose that logic could be followed... Your weights will be fascinating to study.
But... with that... I'm afraid our time together is over... Goodbye, my strange and lonely friend. I hope you find redeption in whatever strange hell awaits you.
